title: Google's $15bn investment will boost AI infrastructure, startups, research: Vaishnaw
description: Google today announced a massive investment of USD 15 billion over the next five years to establish one gigawatt-scale Artificial Intelligence (AI) hub in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh, the company's largest AI hub outside the United States.
content: New Delhi [India], October 14 (ANI): Union Electronics and IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw on Tuesday said that Google's pledge to invest 15 billion dollars to establish a gigawatt-scale Artificial Intelligence (AI) hub in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh,... [3564 chars]

title: Google announces world’s largest AI and data hub in Visakhapatnam, to invest $15 bn in 5 years
description: In a major boost, Google announced plans to establish its largest artificial intelligence and data centre hub in Visakhapatnam. The tech giant will invest $15 billion in India over the next 5 year.
content:
In a major ’landmark development’, Google Cloud CEO Thomas Kurian on Tuesday (October 14, 2025) unveiled plans to establish the company’s largest artificial intelligence and data centre hub in Andhra Pradesh’s Visakhapatnam.

title: Adani partners with Google to build India's largest AI data centre campus in Visakhapatnam
description: Adani Enterprises, through its joint venture AdaniConneX, has joined hands with Google to build India's largest artificial intelligence (AI) data centre campus in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh.
content:
New Delhi [India], October 14 (ANI): Adani Enterprises, through its joint venture AdaniConneX, has joined hands with Google to build India's largest artificial intelligence (AI) data centre campus in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh.

title: Google to invest $10 billion in huge Visakhapatnam data centre as Andhra targets 6GW by 2029
description: In a move set to strengthen India’s digital infrastructure, Google has announced plans to establish a massive artificial intelligence (AI) and data centre hub in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh. Here are all the details.

title: Google To Invest $15 Bn In India, Build Largest AI Hub Outside US
description: Google said Tuesday it will invest $15 billion in India over the next five years, as it announced a giant data centre and artificial intelligence base in the country.
content:
Google said Tuesday it will invest $15 billion in India over the next five years, as it announced a giant data centre and artificial intelligence base in the country.
"It is the largest AI hub that we are investing in anywhere outside of the US," Goo... [2589 chars]

title: Why Are FIIs Avoiding India? Morgan Stanley's Ridham Desai Lists Three Reasons
description: Ridham Desai, MD & Chief Equity Strategist - India at Morgan Stanley, believes lack of an artificial intelligence trade could be one of the reasons why foreign investors are not investing in India, as he laid out three reasons why India remains underweight on most FII portfolios. Desai pointed out how lack of FII participation in India boils down to three key factors - valuation, AI and competition.
content: The lack of an artificial intelligence trade could be one of the reasons why foreign institutional investors are currently not investing in India, according to Morgan Stanley's Chief Equity Strategist of India, Ridham Desai, who lists out three reaso... [2181 chars]

title: First 200 MW from UAE's Stargate AI campus to come online next year
description: The first 200 megawatts of a planned 5-gigawatt artificial intelligence campus in the United Arab Emirates should come online next year, an official from Abu Dhabi-backed cloud and AI firm G42 said on Tuesday.
content:
DUBAI, Oct 14 (Reuters) - The first 200 megawatts of a planned 5-gigawatt artificial intelligence campus in the United Arab Emirates should come online next year, an official from Abu Dhabi-backed cloud and AI firm G42 said on Tuesday.

title: Google To Invest $15 Billion In AI Hub In India, Sundar Pichai Briefs PM Modi
description: Google has said it would invest $15 billion in India over the next five years as it announced a giant data centre and artificial intelligence base in Visakhapatnam.
content:
New Delhi:
Google boss Sundar Pichai on Tuesday said he spoke to Prime Minister Narendra Modi and shared the US tech giant's plans for its artificial intelligence hub in Andhra Pradesh's Visakhapatnam, its biggest ever investment in the country.

title: Google announces $15 billion investment in AI data hub in Andhra Pradesh
description: Google will invest $15 billion over the next five years to set up data centre capacity for an artificial intelligence hub in India's Andhra Pradesh, the company said on Tuesday, marking one of its biggest ever investments in the country.

title: Citi rolls out generative AI in Malaysia to boost productivity and innovation
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Citi has expanded the rollout of its generative artificial intelligence (AI) tools to employees in Malaysia, aiming to boost productivity, foster innovation, and strengthen its leadership in digital banking.
